item.title: First Post
item.description: Finally got little time to make some progress on this side project.

item.title: About
item.description:
I am the Linux and Geek type of guy - if you have questions regarding topics I have covered in my videos or if you need more help to understand something then feel free to reach out to me at tuxedobytes.locals.com.

We (You and Me) can try to solve any relevant technical problem which you encountered at school, work or home. We can also schedule a private online (e.g. Google Meet) tutoring in the domain of linux, system engineering, programming etc.
